title: Visual Studio insertions don't update NuGet packages
body:
Insertions to the internal VS repo, like (Microsoft-internal) https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/595983, don't update MSBuild.props with the updated MSBuild packages, so VS is building against stale MSBuild.

This also caused a failed trigger on the "can the new MSBuild build VS itself?" check, leading to #11091.
